transArray.content: The environment is very good, clean and hygienic

Dear guest, thank you for choosing Hanting! Hantingâ€™s breakfast is a combination of Chinese and Western, buffet style, and is very popular among tourists. Seeing that you have a special liking for our fried noodles during your stay this time, I very much hope that you will If you can come to my house again, our hotel has also added a self-service laundry room, dryer, and delivery robot. It is also very close to Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station and Joy City, which is very convenient. We look forward to your visit again!
